name: Vector Fluxx
description:
VECTOR FLUXX is the first game by the FHS Game Development Club. It's an action roguelike topdown shooter taking place in a futuristic vaporwave world.  Use bits collected from enemies as ammo, or to upgrade your character. 

  • 10 unique levels, 6 enemies, and a bossfight.
  • 12 ways to upgrade your character's stats, which create many strategies and interesting choices.
  • 15 weapons with different abilities like heat-seeking and ricocheting bullets.
  • An awesome synth soundtrack that adapts to the way you play, and your combo.
  • Speedrunning timer and other options.

Controls:

  • Movement: [W][A][S][D]
  • Boost: [SPACE]
  • Shoot / attack: [LEFT CLICK]
  • Teleport: [RIGHT CLICK]
  • Change selected weapon: [SCROLL] or [F]
  • Pick up weapon: [E]

Have performance issues in the browser version? Try disabling VFX and fullscreening from the graphics menu. Or, you can download and play the standalone version below.
